keyFacts: The document summarizes account activity for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for April 2014.
The beginning balance of the account on April 1, 2014, was $510,699.94.
There were no deposits or significant transactions during the month, leading to an ending balance of $510,699.94.
Service charges and fees for the account during this period were reported as $0.00.
Amantla Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries related to the account.
